text.0: by thy fair splendours mighty power o agni bring victorious wealth.
text.1: wealth that oercometh all mankind and near us conquereth in fight.
text.2: victorious agni bring to us the wealth that vanquisheth in war.
text.3: for thou art wonderful and true giver of strength in herds of kine.
text.4: for all the folk with one accord whose sacred grass is trimmed and strewn.
text.5: invite thee to their worshiphalls as a dear priest for choicest wealth.
text.6: for he the god of all men hath gotten him might that quelleth foes.
text.7: o agni in these homes shine forth bright god for our prosperity shine purifier splendidly.
